All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ArrayTiles
The ArrayTiles class represents the 15-puzzle game board in array form.
Configuration
The Configuration class is the configurator of the 15-puzzle game.
ConfigurationFormatException
 
ConfigurationStore
The ConfigurationStore class handles loading and validating N-Puzzle configurations from a file, URL, or Reader source.
InvalidConfigurationException
 
MatrixTiles
The MatrixTiles class represents the 15-puzzle game board in matrix form.
NPuzzle
The Npuzzle class is the entry point of the 15-puzzle game.
PositionOutOfBoardException
 
Tiles
The Tiles class represents the 15-puzzle game board.
Tiles.Direction
Keeps the values of possible directions
